users.motto: Silly southern dances, passionate romances, kissing with the lights on, let's make this song our song.
Keep it right, keep it tight.
Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.

mottos.text: Keep it easy, keep it breezy.
Keep it right, keep it tight.
Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
